---
title: "EDA buscas"
output: html_notebook
---

O objeto principal da análise são as buscas e a navegação depois da busca. Criamos esses dados a partir dos dados originais da wikimedia em `/data/search_data.csv`. 

Aqui, exploramos esses dados. 

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r ETL}
buscas = read_csv(here::here("data/search_data.csv"))
```

```{r}
buscas %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = results)) + 
    geom_histogram(binwidth = 5) 
```

```{r}
buscas %>% 
    filter(results <= 25) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = group, y = results)) + 
    geom_violin()  #+
    #geom_boxplot() # +
    #geom_jitter(alpha = .4, width = .1, size = .6)
    #scale_y_log10()
```


```{r}
buscas %>% 
    filter(results > 25) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = group, y = results)) + 
    geom_violin() # +
    #geom_boxplot() # +
    #geom_jitter(alpha = .4, width = .1, size = .6)
    #scale_y_log10()
```


```{r}
buscas
```
